headline: Carrier Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.225 per outstanding share of Carrier common stock. The dividend will be payable on August 8, 2025 to shareowners of record at the close of business on July 21, 2025.

headline: 2 Air Conditioner & Heating Stocks to Watch in a Booming Industry
summary: Stocks like CARR and FIX are likely to benefit from the Air Conditioner & Heating industry's pro-environmental moves and data center surge.
